title: Erdős Problem #30
description: Let ... be the maximum size of a Sidon set in .... Is it true that, for every ...,\[h(N) = N^{1/2}+O_\epsilon(N^\epsilon)?\]

overview.historicalContext: Erdős Problem #30 from erdosproblems.com. Originally offered with a prize of $1000.
overview.problemStatement: Let $h(N)$ be the maximum size of a Sidon set in $\{1,\ldots,N\}$. Is it true that, for every $\epsilon>0$,\[h(N) = N^{1/2}+O_\epsilon(N^\epsilon)?\]
